caption.p: ( A) The clot lysis activity of MEHA, streptokinase (SK) and distilled water (negative control). ( B) The healthy volunteer status presented. Results are expressed as mean ± SEM of three independent experiments. *** p < 0.001, significantly different from control; ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s test. MEHA: Methanol extract of Homalomena aromatica leaves.
